HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:
Ceny jsou odstupňované podle hmotnosti.
GLS: 99 Kč - 379 Kč
PPL: 109 Kč - 399 Kč
DPD: 119 Kč - 439 Kč
Existují také příplatky za nadrozměrné/neskladné zboží (PPL extra, DPD extra/speciál).

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:
Paletová přeprava GEIS: od 549 Kč do 3299 Kč v závislosti na hmotnosti.
Doprava autem prodávajícího (DAP): od 549 Kč do 2499 Kč v závislosti na hmotnosti.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: do 1 týdne od Vaší objednávky (pro závoz vlastními vozy)

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing:
Ceny jsou odstupňované podle hmotnosti.
GLS ParcelShop: 49 Kč - 199 Kč
PPL ParcelShop: 79 Kč - 349 Kč
DPD PickupShop: 79 Kč - 119 Kč

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing:
Ceny jsou odstupňované podle hmotnosti.
GLS ParcelBox: 49 Kč - 199 Kč
PPL ParcelBox: 79 Kč - 349 Kč
DPD PickupBox: 79 Kč - 119 Kč

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers a wide range of delivery methods including standard home delivery, parcel shops, parcel lockers, bulky/pallet delivery, and free in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Main parcel carriers are GLS, PPL, and DPD. Bulky items are handled by GEIS or the seller's own van. PRICING: All shipping costs are calculated based on the weight of the order, with detailed price tables available for each service. There is no general free shipping threshold mentioned. RESTRICTIONS: A small order fee of 109 Kč is charged for orders under 299 Kč, but this is waived for registered customers or for in-store pickup.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Free in-store pickup is available in České Budějovice. The store offers specialized shipping for oversized or irregularly shaped items (PPL/DPD extra/speciál). For very heavy orders (over 600 kg), delivery by the seller's own van is an option. Pallet shipping is available for bulky goods. COD is available with a surcharge of 39 Kč for parcels and 49 Kč for pallets.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is exceptionally detailed and transparent. Prices are clearly broken down by provider and weight in comprehensive tables. The different shipping categories (standard, parcel shop, pallet) are well-explained, helping customers choose the best option. The only missing piece of information is the standard delivery timeframe (e.g., D+1, D+2) for parcel services.
